resources.string:
Day 1:
• Weighted Chinup
(45 secs rest)

• Push Press
• Medball Floor Slams

• Back Squat
• Overhead Forward Medball Throw

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Barbell Upright Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Weighted Dips
• Dumbell Shrugs

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullup

• Bench Press
• Medball Plyo Pushup

• Power Clean
• Overhead Forward Medball Throw

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown
• One Arm Standing Dumbell Hammer Curl into Shoulder Press
• One Arm Standing Cable Row
• One Arm Dumbell Power Snatch

Core Work:
• Hanging Twists

Day 1:
• Push Press
•Weighted Chinup
(60 seconds between each set)
• Back Squat

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Weighted Dips
• Dumbell Shrugs

• Overhead Dumbell Tricep Extension
• Seated Dumbell Hammer Curls
• Laying Dumbell Tricep Extensions
• Standing Dumbell Hammer Curl
Into Shoulder Press

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullup
• Bench Press
(60 seconds between each set)

• Power Clean
• Overhead Forward Medball Throw

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown
• One Arm Standing Cable Row
• One Arm Dumbell Power Snatch

• Standing Rope Hammer Cable Curls
• Tricep Rope Pushdowns
• Standing Cable Curl
• Standing Rope Tricep Cable Kickbacks

Day 1:
• Weighted Pullup
• Bench Press

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Weighted Dips
• Dumbell Shrugs

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown
• One Arm Standing Cable Row
• One Arm Dumbell Power Snatch

Day 2:
• Push Press
• Weighted Chinup

• Power Clean
(30 sec rest between each rep, full rest between sets)
• Back Squat

Day 1:
• Push Press
• Weighted Chinups
(20 sec between rep groups, full rest between sets. Complete all 6 reps of push press before moving onto chinup in each set)

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Dumbell Shrugs
[Circuit Style]

• Overhead Dumbell Tricep Extension
• Seated Dumbell Hammer Curls
• Laying Dumbell Tricep Extensions
• Standing Dumbell Hammer Curl
Into Shoulder Press
[Circuit Style]

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups
• Bench Press
(20 sec between rep groups)

• Power Clean
(30 sec rest between each rep,
full rest between sets)

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown
• Cheating Dumbell Upright Row
[Circuit Style]

• Standing Rope Hammer Cable Curls
• Tricep Rope Pushdowns
• Standing Cable Curl
• Standing Rope Tricep Cable Kickbacks
[Circuit Style]

Day 1:
• Push Press
• Weighted Chinups
• Back Squat

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown

• Overhead Dumbell Tricep Extension
• Seated Dumbell Hammer Curls
• Laying Dumbell Tricep Extensions

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups
• Bench Press
• Power Clean

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown

• Standing Cable Curls
• Tricep Pushdowns
• Standing Reverse Cable Curl

Circuit 1:
• Hanging Twists
• Roman Chair Medball Situp Throws
• Plate Around Head

Circuit 2:
• Pikes
• Bar Twists
• Bar Sidebend

Circuit 3:
• Russian Twists
• Weighted Back Extensions
• Weighted Plank

Day 1:
• Weighted Chinups
• Incline Barbell Press

• Weighted Dips
• Incline Prone Dumbell Row

• Hanging Twists
• Roman Chair Med Ball Situp Throws
• Plate Around Head

Day 2:
• Power Cleans
• Push Press
• Back Squat

Day 1:
• Weighted Chinups
(Have a partner pull you down slowly as you
resist for the eccentric portion of the chinup,
perform the concentric portion as explosively as possible)
• Push Press

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown

• Pikes
• Bar Twists
• Bar Sidebend

Day 2:
• Bench Press
• Prone Bench Dumbell Row
(Have a partner push the bar down slowly as you
resist for the eccentric portion of the lift,
perform the concentric portion as explosively as possible)
• Power Clean

• Snatch Grip Deadlift
(Use straps, very wide grip, feel weight on the balls
of your foot, pull through the foot and stay upright!)

• One Arm Dumbell Row
• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Straight Arm Pulldown

Day 3:
• Weighted Pullups
(Have a partner pull you down slowly as you
resist for the eccentric portion of the pullup,
perform the concentric portion as explosively as possible)
• Back Squat

• Standing Cable Curls
• Tricep Pushdowns
• Standing Reverse Cable Curl
(A curl with palms facing down)

• Hanging Twists
• Medball Situp Throws
• Plate Around Head
(Hold a 10-20kg plate and while keeping
your body motionless quickly move the plate
from your abdomen around your head and back down
6 times then change directions for 6 more reps)

Day 1:
• Weighted Chinups

• Bench Press
• Prone Bench Dumbell Row
• Power Cleans

• Roman Chair Situps
• Barbell Side Bends
• Barbell Twists
(10 each side)

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench DB Row

• Front Squat
• Leg Curl

• Hanging Twists
• Roman Chair Situps
• Front Plank

Day 1:
• Weighted Chinups

• Bench Press
Pause briefly at 3 points during lowering portion
of each rep
• Prone Dumbell Row

• Dumbell Push Press
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Upright Row
• Bicep Curls
Circuit Style

• Roman Chair Situps
• Barbell Side Bends
• Barbell Twists
(10 each side)
• Light Cable External Rotation

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups
Pause briefly at 3 points during lowering portion
of each rep

• Incline Dumbell Press
• Incline Prone Bench DB Row

• Inverted Row
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Face Pull
• Tricep Pushdown
Circuit Style

• Hanging Twists
• Roman Chair Situps
• Front Plank
• Light Cable External Rotation

Day 3:
• Power Clean
Pick a weight that will allow you to complete
5 reps without rest. Don\'t lift too heavy.
Do not do a full squat after each rep.

• Front Squat
Pause briefly at 3 points during lowering portion
of each rep
• Leg Curl

• Standing Barbell Tricep Extension
• Barbell Curls
• Straight Arm Pulldown
• Rowing Machine
Circuit Style

• Toes to Bar
• V-Sit with twist holding a plate
• Front Plank

Day 1:
• Bench Press (5 second eccentric)
• Prone Incline DB Rows (elbows flared out)
• Prone Incline DB Rows (elbows tucked in)

• Grappler Press
• One Arm Dumbell Row
• Muscle Snatch

• Barbell Slide Curls
• Reverse Curls

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups (5 sec eccentric)
• Straight Arm Pullovers

• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Dumbell Row
• Back Squat

• Barbell Slide to Forehead
• Reverse Curls

Day 3:
• Weighted Chinups (5 sec eccentric)
• Straight Arm Cable Pulldowns
• Snatch Grip Deadlift

• Weighted Dips (5 second eccentric)
• Prone Incline DB Rows (elbows flared out)
• Prone Incline DB Rows (elbows tucked in)

• Barbell Slide Curls
• Reverse Curls

Hillsprints:
• 20-30m x 4 sets

Tempo Sprints:
• 100 yard sprint, 60 yard walk
Repeat till technical breakdown x 2 sets

Day 1:
• Weighted Chinups
• Straight Arm Cable Pulldowns

• Bench Press
• Machine Row
• Hexbar Deadlifts

Day 2:
• Weighted Pullups
• Straight Arm Pullovers

• One Arm Dumbell Push Press
• One Arm Dumbell Row

• Weighted Dips
• Barbell Curl
• Barbell Reverse Curl

Day 3:
• Muscle Snatch

• Incline Dumbell Bench Press
• Prone Incline DB Rows
• Incline Dumbell Hammer Curls

• Front Squats
• Leg Curls

Hillsprints:
• 20-30m x 4 sets

Tempo Sprints:
• 100 yard sprint, 60 yard walk
Repeat till technical breakdown x 2 sets

Optional Core Work:
• Roman Chair Situps
• Barbell Side Bends
• Barbell Twists

OR:
• Hanging Twists
• Roman Chair Situps
• Seated Barbell Twists
